pages.text: Roasting your food - $(italic)a word here which means the action of cooking something in an $(l:innovate/stone_oven)Oven$() $(italic)or over a $(l:survive/campfire)Campfire$() - not only enhances the flavor of the food through a process often referred to as caramelization, $(thing)$(bold)roasted food has restorative properties that surpass those of its unroasted alternative$().
